1.content:
This is where the RP's will start. If you plan to add your own RP, please use the first chapter to give a brief summary and who you did it with. We would appreciate some form of good writing, but nobodies perfect. So if you have typos, it's okay.

I do check this site frequently, so if you have any questions, you know where to find me.
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
Welcome to the first section of this interactive.

This RP was done by a writer of the name Sora, and myself, J-Fox. This is actually my first RP ever.

This is about a human becoming a POW (prisoner of War) to a Anthro Fox. The artic fox decides to make the poor human a slave, believing that his race is Superior and want to demonstrate the humans place.

This will contain lots of m/m interaction, paws, shrink, submission, humiliation and other good stuff along those lines.

Feel free to add on.
11.title: RP Session Numero Uno

111.content: It had been two days since he had been tossed into this dank, dark prison cell and chained to the wall like he was some sort of animal. A metal collar fastened his neck to the concrete wall, while similar cuffs shackled his wrists. A single lightbulb hung from the ceiling and flickered dimly...all day, twenty-four seven. Not like time mattered...no one had disturbed him since he was put in here...but that was about to change. A sound of jingling keys woke the human up from his nap, head jerking upright as a lone figure entered into the room. It seemed to be an anthropomorphic fox, eight feet tall. The canine wore no shirt, revealing it's well built upper body. Looking down, the human saw he was wearing camo-esque pants with two pairs of black combat boots covering his huge paws. The fox's yellow eyes flickered onto the human for a few moments, before he stepped out of the hallway. Within moments, he returned, a plastic chair in his ivory handpaws. He set the chair down a foot away from the chained human and slumped down into it with a chuckle. "Well well well....what do we have here...a disgusting little human..." the fox grinned down as the human glared in return.
111.title: Let's begin.

1111.content:
The human had no idea what was instore for him. For weeks thousands upon thousand of the anthro forces had taken charge of the world. that last of the human armies were being picked off. No one knew how, the forces just vanished. Reports were sent in of whole platoons just vanishing, but nothing could be explained. No viable source of information made it possible. How he ended up in this cell was unbeknownst to him, but he prayed to whatever god was out there that brought this hell, prayed to have him released... he might just have that pray answered. The fox, well groomed, must have been a high ranking official. "Alright human, this is how it's going to work, your life if worth less then little to me, and I may just decide to end you. But why spoil the fun?" The artic fox called leaned back comfortably in a chair built to small for his tall frame. He called out "Take off his shackles" Two other guards entered the room. The human looked to them with similar disgust. The fox spoke again, his devious cruel smile never leaving his face, I wouldn
wouldn’t try anything funny.."

Finally, after the heel had been slammed onto his bruised body, did it end. The fox curled his long toes over Tom’s face, shoving his face directly into his middle toecrotch, the musk of his toes causing Tom to vomit a little inside of his mouth.
“Mmmn. Much better. Now this is how this is going to play out little bug. You are going to worship your god like a good little human bug should. I’m going to release my paw, and you’re going to pray to me as your new god...” the fox leaned down to his paw, his large toothy maw inches away from Tom’s tiny head.
“I want you to kiss the ground I walk on….” He spat directly onto poor Tom’s face, the force of the saliva causing Tom’s head to slam on the ground.
“Get to work, insect.”
1111111111111111111111111.title: Next

11111111111111111111111111.content:
Tom struggled to get up. All hope was lost, the only thing he valued was his life, he did have the will to live. Even if it meant being this fox’s foot toy.

He did as he was instructed and began to bow in front of the sitting macro pretending to pray to the beast as if he were his true god. Tom made a realization that in his position, the fox was his god. He now controlled every aspect of his life and he could end him at any moment.

All the while the now god like fox sat in his chair, enjoying his little servant thoroughly. For he knew his end all fate. But why spoil the surprise and tell his little human slave.
“Stand up and lick between my toes, bug. That is where you belong, between my toes and under my glorious footpaw. This is where all humans belong. Show you master… I mean God how much you love the smell and taste of my paws. Do it NOW”
11111111111111111111111111.title: Next

111111111111111111111111111.content:
Fearing nothing but is life, he did what he was told. He walked toward the wiggling claws and furry toes. He pushed his head between then, and just stood there. He licked the crevice between his toes, and at his new size, picked up quite a bit of debris. It all tasted of the sweat and grime of his now godlike master. But it was now magnified. He dragged his tongue over the fur and paw of this toes, always trying to spit out whatever entered in his mouth. This did not make the fox god very happy.

“How dare you try to spit. Eat it ALL puny slave.” The fox bent over to make sure his bug was doing as he was told. Tom was vigorously licking between all of his master’s massive toes, each one being half his own height and each revealing a new bounty of grime and grit that lay between each. Tom couldn’t help but wonder how his master got so dirty. But that didn’t matter, the fact was he was reduced to nothing before this foxgod.
111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1111111111111111111111111111.content:
And Tom licked…and licked…and licked. At times, the grime was so thick that he actually DID have to eat the clumps of toejam, chewing each little mound thoroughly…much to the pleasure of his new god, who had to admit…although the humans were a weak and pathetic race…they certainly had an admirable survival instinct.
The vigorous licking of the fox’s toecrotch lasted for a good hour as Tom thoroughly cleaned each space, swallowing the massive amounts of grime. After all was said and done, Tom didn’t have to worry about being hungry anymore…for his belly was full of his god’s toejam.
“You should be honored little bug. To eat the dirt in between your god’s toes. I’m sure it was delicious, most likely…the best thing you ever tasted…right?” he smirked down at Tom, who stood before his gargantuan feet. “Tell me little bug…tell me. Would you rather eat the dirt between my toes…or see your girlfriend again. Choose wisely…” he snickered.
1111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

11111111111111111111111111111.content:
Tom stepped back and began to yell up to his new foxgod “I want to see her, please let me see her!”

The fox pretended to have difficulty hearing. “What? You would rather eat the dirt between my toes? Well okay, if you don’t want to see your mate… have it your way.” He let out another cruel snicker. “You have another paw to do… and if you do an extra good job… maybe I’ll let you see her..” The artic fox god shuffled his paws over, placing a fresh, dirty paw infront of his defeated slave. Tom could do nothing but obey and hope he would let him see her. Tom stepped up his vigor this time, making good time as he licked the toejam out. The foxgod seemed genuinely impressed. “I knew you were right for me… or more so my paws…” Tom ignored him and continued the task at hand, all in hope for him to see her again. At least one last time…
11111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The toes were licked clean in an amazingly small space of time. Tom spared no inattention to detail as he licked all of the excess grime from his god’s toes. However…Tom was feeling a tad light headed from all of the grime he had quite literally just eaten. He plopped himself on the floor and cradled his aching stomach as the fox splayed his toes, inspecting each toecrotch meticulously.
“Not bad pawslave…not bad at all.” He murred down to the human bug, setting his footpaw back down onto the tiled floor. “However…they’re not perfectly clean…which means you will be punished…
Without warning, The fox grabbed Tom roughly, grasping him tightly as he raised the tiny human to his maw. “I think I will let you see your girlfriend however, since I’m feeling particularly nice today…” his smirk, however, stated otherwise. The fox padded out of the room, shutting the door with a gentle clasp as he began to walk down the dank, depressing, lime green hallway with his little pawbitch grasped tightly in his hand.
This little walk only lasted a few moments though, as the fox stopped in front of a door, sliding what seemed to be a keycard in a slot just above the doorknob. The door clicked open, and to Tom’s delight, he saw his mate huddled in the corner, obviously frightened of the fox.
“Nice to see you again…” he growled in pleasure padding to the lone chair in the room. “I have a little guest with us today. Say hello to your former mate bug…” He dangled Tom before his mate’s eyes.
“But see. Unlike you…he’s been a bad little bug. And needs to be punished…” the fox whispered hotly, stripping off his pants yet again to reveal his large member.
“Which one of you goes first. The one who doesn’t gets to lick my paws while the other is pleasuring me….” He grinned, sitting down, his marvelous tail flicking happily behind him.
“Mmn. Bitch. Service my paws. You” he pointed towards Tom’s mate. “Come up here…”
111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

1111111111111111111111111111111.content: He held Tom up forhis mate to see his diminished form. “Oh Tom, thankgod your alive!” she spoke allowed. The fox grinned, “well alive for now, you see I haven’t decided the full extent of his punishment. But one step at a time right? Start licking my paws bitch. Heh, you two have the same name…” he again chuckled to himself at his cruel humor. The foxgod sat down in a chair vary similar to the one in Toms old cell. “Get started”. She must have been used in a similar fashion as Tom was because she knew exactly what to do. She lifted her masters paw and began to sensually lick up and down the black pawpad and between the toes, partially cleaned by his little bug slave, her boyfriend. All the while the fox held his 4 inch companion over his large member. “You know what to do..” and sadly Tom did, he seemed to recognize his place in the world now. He was at least satisfied to see his girlfriend alive and in somewhat good health. The fox dropped Tom onto the edge of the chair. Tom looked up to this godlike creature and at the massive pair of white furry balls before him. “Well… what are you waiting for?” Tom responded by climbing up the musky scrotum up to the sheath that used to contain the massive organ. “Oh.. that feels good” the fox responded to either the tiny movements of Tom or the licking his girlfriend was giving. Tom continued his climb up to the massive pink, fleshy organ.
1111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next

111112.content:
"He he!" The fox laughed. "If you choose!" The fox sat down on you.

What happened?
111112.title: Next

12.content:
You are a member of the benastrian army, the ikon unit. Your job well, to put it nicely your unit is assigned two types of missions. First your given a name a picture and a folder and with in a time stated in the folder that name is no longer in use, the person it belonged to dead. The second is to protect high ranking government and religious officials. Previously you'd only taken assassin missions bur decided that a break of pace would be nice. Your mission is to protect the daughter of an important religious figure, she is also known for her magic power. interestingly enough she is two years younger than you making her 19 and you 21. Oddly though only one other person was assigned this job she's 24 and your friend. Also she has been your partner for the past two years. It took a little convincing to get her on board, her saying "fine but, you owe me". You were slightly worried about what you owed her but, as you were reading over the mission statement when you noticed something "For this mission you are to treat your targets word as law proper punishment will be decided if you go against her word."


Things left to first poster to decide : Names, Types of furries, Main character's gender, ect...

possible themes: humiliation, f/f interaction, three somes, betrayal ( just because you start out working for her doesn't mean it has to stay that way), ect...
Possible starting points: main character, girl being protected, main character's friend, assassin after girl.

info.brief_description: This is built of furry roleplay's that other writers and I have made. Feel free to add.
info.description:
Hello, and welcome to the Furry Role Play sessions. Here you will see past role-plays between myself and others. Feel free to add chapters to what we add. We just ask that you keep the content similar to what has already been written.

I have only added one session so far, but this will change over time. I am in the process of editing and adding transitions to the first RP, but I just added the whole thing quickly so it was on here.

If you like what you see and would like to RP, send me a message either here or my FA page at http://www.furaffinity.net/user/j-fox/ I will RP about a lot of stuff, so don't be shy, the first RP on here was actually my VERY first RP.

Credit is always given to both authors, and if you have an RP session of you own you would like to add, feel free. But please keep it furry in some form or fashion.

Enjoy!

Even with just the few views I have seen in that past day, this tells me that there ARE others who like this stuff, so rate it so... and add!
